column1: 135 kph. full outside off, punched through the covers with simplicity
full on the pads, swinging in from middle, pushed to deep midwicket
good length, wide outside off, lots of room to free his arms and the outswing doesn't matter. He slashes it through the covers on the up
good length, swings away from slightly outside off, left alone
back of a length in the corridor and it straightens this time. He's looking for the outswing but it goes between bat and body, nicely through to Haddin
137 kph, back of a length on off stump, opens his face and tries to run it down. Point gets a hand on it but can only deflect it
pushed flat on a good length at middle stump, forward defence
short and spinning down leg from a middle stump line, glanced to short fine leg
good length, flighted and spinning onto the pads from outside leg, goes forward and turns it to short fine
full on the pads, flicked to deep midwicket
floated in on leg stump, steps out and flicks it to deep square
83kph, flighted nicely on middle and off, he steps out, gets to the pitch and places it beautifully with soft hands to the right of long-on
134 kph, good length on leg stump, backs away, but cramps himself and can only push it to covers
back of a length outside off, backs away and tries to slash it over cover, beaten
back of a length on the pads, pushed in front of deep square off the hips, but Munro runs in quickly to keep it to a single
135 kph, full outside off, Wright  leaps in front and across the stumps to try and flick it, but it catches his pads and that hit him just in line, but it was marginal and the umpire says not out
short and wide, chopped off the thick inside edge down to third man
full on middle stump, and he goes across the line and lifts it wide of mid-on. Got the bottom of the bat, but it's one bounce and four
99 kph, pushed full on middle, he steps out and attempts a slog, thick inside edge but it's four at the midwicket boundary
flighted on middle stump, this time he gets to the pitch and middles it to get it over the midwicket boundary on the bounce
full on middle, thumped down to long-on
tossed up on middle and off, steps out and drives it inside-out to mid-off

flighted on middle stump, turns away slightly. He steps out but hasn't got to the pitch of it. Goes through with his shot anyway and get it high over mid-off and it falls safely and rolls away for four
full on the pads, pushed to long-on
full and outside off, tries to make room and drive through the covers, beaten by a long way
ooooh! good length outside off, but he stays put, and lifts it on the up over long-on. Man in form.
133 kph, good length on middle stump, pushed to the covers off the front foot
129 kph, short and in the corridor, doesn't connect his cut but backward point misfields
127 kph, good length, angling in in the corridor, pushed off the front foot to cover
127 kph, back of a length on off stump, swivels, bends down slightly to get on top of it and pulls it late off his hips to the right of deep square leg
slower ball, short and on leg stump, pulled without any timing and short fine dives to stop it on the bounce to his right
132 kph, back of a length on off stump, defends with soft hands towards point who has a shy at the non-striker's and misses. Safe run.
good length, shapes back in slightly and he goes for a cut expecting it to hold the angle. Has to hurry and get his bat down to slice it straight to point
slower ball, short outside off, pulls it hard but straight to deep midwicket
full outside off, takes one step forward and slaps it past the bowler's face
soft! A nothing ball, short and on his hips, but he's glanced this straight to short fine. It hangs in the air for a while before reaching the fielder who hasn't had to move
133 kph, good length, angled across the left-hander, too much width and he slaps it on the up past extra cover, full control
138 kph, back of a length, down the leg side
133 kph, good length and wide again, goes for it once more but catches it on the bottom of the bat and it goes aerially for a bit before rolling to deep cover
139 kph, good length, angled across from off stump, he puts a stride across and turns it down to fine leg
short and wide, angling across again, goes for the cut but it climbs slightly and beats the outside edge
back of a length on off, uses the angle to push it down to third man off his toes
back of  a length outside off, walks across, cuts the angle, gets on top of it and punches it to long-on
130 kph, back of a length, angled in at off stump, wants to drop this with soft hands and take a run, but the bowler gets across quickly
131 kph, good length, tailing in at off stump, drives it on the up towards long-on, but Henriques puts in a dive in his follow through
119 kph, rolls his fingers on this. Short and outside off, cuts in slightly and he slices it to short third man
well placed. Short and wide, waits for it and chops between backward point and short third man
back of a length on middle, pulled to deep midwicket
113 kph, off cutter outside off on a good length, jumps across and pushes it to long-on
138 kph, bounce aimed at his front shoulder and he ducks awkwardly after having half a mind to hook that
back of a length on middle, backs away and slaps it to mid-off's left, but he puts in a dive and saves three
slower ball, good length outside off, pushed towards cover
back of a length, climbing up on an off stump line, tries to cream this cut but it's a thick outside edge and flies down to third man
back of a length on middle, pushed to midwicket off the back foot
138 kph, KP getting impatient. Backs away, exposes all stump and goes for a slog, but he misses it and it flies over the stumps
good length on leg stump, turns and goes down the leg side
flighted on middle and leg, tries to push it through square leg, can't connect and it hits him on the pad
flighted on middle stump, draws him forward, inside edge onto pad and would've ballooned to short leg in a Test
pushed flat and short on middle, steps out and pushes it through midwicket
good length on middle, uses the turn to push it to short fine
good length on leg stump, turning away from the hips, gets on the back foot and pushes it square on the leg side
good length on off stump, slight turn in, drops it into the off side with soft hands
129 kph, back of a length in the corridor, makes room and slices it down to third man
wide of the crease, back of a length on off and he uses the angle to flat-bat it over midwicket
back of a length on off stump, backs away and pushes it to point
good length on off stump, climbs and beats the outside edge on the attempted stab to third man
back of  a length in the corridor, pulled straight to midwicket
bang out of the middle! Back of a length in the corridor again, this time he has picked the length nicely and pulls it flat over midwicket and into his team's dug out
good length outside off, doesn't turn as much as he expects it to and he can't push it into the leg side
drops it short on middle, goes back and mistimes the pull to deep square leg
good length on middle, steps out, beaten in flight, inside edge onto pads
flat, good length on middle, gets a stride forward and across and tickles the paddle sweep fine. Deep square leg runs a long way to cut it off
good length on middle, pushed straight to short fine
good length on the off stump, draws him forward and restricts him to a forward defence
full on middle stump, angled into the pads and KP wants to whip this out of the ground, but gets a thick inside edge straight to fine leg
leg cutter, full on middle, thick inside edge on his slog and it goes to the left of fine leg and that's his fifty
good length on middle, winds up to pull it, but it's too full and he can only get it as far as midwicket
in the block hole on his leg, digs it out and gets the flick between fine leg and deep midwicket
leg cutter, back of a length outside off, pulls it between those two fielders again
yorker on leg stump, flicked down to fine leg
good length on leg stump, inside edges his reverse sweep onto his right boot
floated in on middle, gets down the track in trademark haphazard manner and slaps it straight past the bowler
dropped short on middle, pulled to deep square
arm ball, short on middle, steps out and pulls to deep midwicket
short on middle, gets back, adjusts for the bounce and turns it to deep square
arm ball, angled across short from middle stump, miscues his late cut, chops it into the floor
leg cutter, good length outside off, makes room and slaps it past extra cover
bouncer on off stump, goes hard with the hook, gets it high on the bat and straight to deep square leg
short outside off, gets too big on KP and he pulls out from his cut and lets it go
135 kph, low full toss angling in towards leg stump, he clears his front foot and tries to slog it into the stands, but gets a thick outside edge that goes just over backward point
overpitched on middle, clears the front leg, lifts it over his partner and long-on can't get to that
yorker at off stump, tries to slice it through the off side. Goes slowly to the right of extra cover who gets across quickly and shies at Pietersen's end. Safely through.
missed stumping. Good length on leg stump, backs away and tries the slog sweep. Misses it but Haddin doesn't collect down the leg
good length on leg stump, goes for the switch hit but gets a thick edge and straight to short third man

good length on middle, steps out and gets beaten by flight, wants to slog it but it's inside edge, onto the pad, and it floats up and hits the top of leg stump. Would've been out at least two other ways if he wasn't bowled
hangs it up outside off, beats him in flight and he can't connect his slog and it rolls back to Lyon

good length outside off, steps out and misses his swipe, Haddin has fumbled it several times before stumping him and it's been referred...out. Haddin fumbled there and had the ball jammed between his chest and gloves as he took the bails off. That might have brushed the grille, but it's just about legitimate, deems the umpire.
pushed flat outside off, goes back and pushes it to the midwicket region where the bowler gets across to clean up
short and wide outside off, tries to chop it through the off side, beaten

what a catch! The replays for the stumping show it might not have been out, but there's no doubt here! Full outside off, throws his bat at it and gets an inside edge. Haddin dives at least 4 yards to his right and is aerial as he takes this one-handed
short outside off, mistimed cut to point
low full toss outside off, pushed to sweeper cover
slower ball, short outside off, cut straight to point
full outside off, places his drive wide to the left of long-off
flighted outside off, steps out and gets to the pitch, but can't connect his slog towards the empty midwicket boundary
back of a length on off, chopped to short third man
good length on leg stump, he makes room but turns it into the leg side anyway, straight to midwicket
good length on middle, tries to push it into the off side, but it lands next to him
flat and short on middle, steps down the track and pushes it behind square leg
they are. Good length on middle, pushed off the back foot to midwicket
low full toss on off stump, wants to slog it, but gets the bottom and straight to long-on. He's just not got in today
slower ball, short and wide outside off, left alone
full outside off, backs away, gets low and middles his chop, but it goes flat and straight to Abbott at sweeper cover
slower ball, good length outside off, walks across and tries to slog it over midwicket, but gets an inside edge and it doesn't even clear the circle
slower ball, good length outside off, no feet from Harper, pushes away from his body and gets an edge through the  first slip region
good length outside off, tries to slap it over mid-off but gets another outside edge, this time straight to third man

that's an end to his misery. Full outside off, tails away from him slightly, he backs away and tries to hit it over extra cover, but the bat has turned in his hands and the ball goes high towards deep cover, who runs in, adjusts for the swerve and latches onto to it inches from the ground. Good composure
slower ball outside off, tries to force it through the off side, but it goes straight back to the bowler who has a shy at the stumps and catches him on the backside
slower ball, steps out and swipes across, gets beaten and they go for the run. Haddin gathers, takes a moment and under-arms it to break the stumps
slower short ball, wide outside off, swipes at it and gets a top edge towards sweeper cover, they hesitate with the running and lose out on a run
slower ball, back of a length outside off, he goes for the pull, holds his pose and looks at the midwicket boundary. But that has flown off the top edge, straight over Haddin's head
slower ball again, pulls it and gets it high on the bat. This time it has gone in the direction he's looking in but it's up in the air and Lyon takes it at midwicket
slower ball, back of a length outside off, goes for the pull, gets it off the bottom of the bat and hits it straight to midwicket
good length on middle stump, defended off the front foot
full on leg stump, driven back to the bowler
pushed flat, good length on leg stump, pushed to midwicket
knee-high full toss on the pads, pushed down to long-on
flighted on leg stump, pushed out to deep midwicket
good length on off, pushed tentatively to mid-off
full, starts on leg stump and swings down the leg side where Harper puts in a great dive
good length on middle, defended off the front foot
back of a length on off stump, cuts it straight to point
back of a length on middle stump, backs away slightly and punches it off the back foot through the covers, it bounces a couple of times and rolls away slowly
good length on off, backs away and slices it over cover off the bottom of the bat, the fielders combine nicely - one flicks it back, the other throws - and keep it down to two
short on middle, climbs up nicely and the batsman has to sway away from this as it flies past his helmet
back of a length on middle, pushed to midwicket
back of a length, angled across from off stump, slashes at it and beaten on the outside edge
back of a length on middle, gets on his toes and hits it square off his back foot, slightly aerially but in the gap and just about rolls away from Gulbis' slide at the boundary
good length on the pads, glanced to short fine
short and wide, slashes hard at it, beaten
good length, goes straight on and down the leg side
back of a length on middle, angled across slightly, waits for it and pushes it sweetly off the back foot through point. Bowe runs across from third man to clean up
short and wide, tries to place the cut this time, but get neither power nor placement. Straight to point
short and down the leg, beats his leg glance
good length on the pads, gets low and sweeps it to short fine
good length on off stump, pushed off the back foot to point, who has a shy at the stumps. Beer fumbles it and it rolls away towards long-off for an extra run
tossed up on middle from over the wicket, pushed to midwicket
pushed flat on the pads on a good length, hit straight to midwicket
good length on middle stump, goes down the track and drives on the up to long-on
full on middle stump, uses his feet nicely, goes down the track, makes room and drives it past extra cover
top of off! Angles it into the batsman on a good length. He clears his foot and tries to slog it over midwicket, but misses it completely and it clips the the off stump
short on middle, he's stepped out first ball and tries to power a pull shot into the midwicket region. Gets a thick inside edge and it goes down to deep square
bouncer angled across him, ducks under it comfortably
steps out and tries to slog it away again. It climbs from back of a length and he gets another inside edge, this time mid-on cuts it off
short and wide, pushed off the back foot to point
short and wide, goes for the cut, but gets an inside edge. Safely through towards short fine
slower ball on off stump, pushed to backward point
back of a length outside leg stump, makes room and tries to carve it over the square leg boundary, but it goes through him and over the stumps
back of a length on middle, charges down at it once more, goes across and connects the pull shot for once.It's flat and hard but straight to mid-on
full on the middle, flicked to deep square
well-directed bouncer on middle stump, cramps him for room, doesn't get enough bat on his attempted hook and it goes to short fine
goes for the bouncer again, but it slides down the leg side
137 kph, back of a length on middle stump, chops it down to third man
leg cutter, slides down leg side at hip-height and he whips it to fine leg
short on middle stump, lets it come on and uses the pace to place it to the right of fine leg
short on leg stump, pulled off the middle, straight to fine leg, who is quite wide
good length, angled in at off stump, front foot defence
leg cutter, good length in the corridor, punched off the back foot to deep cover
good length, angled across from off stump, driven on the up to sweeper cover
short and wide, misses the cut
wrong'un, short and spins back in to cramp him. Has to defend off the back foot
flighted outside off, reaches for it and sweeps to deep square
79 kph, floated wide of off stump, driven to cover
flighted on off stump, steps out and hits it straight down the ground between long-off and the stumps
good length, flighted outside off, doesn't get to the pitch but uses his wrists t drive it to long-off
leg cutter, good length outside off, tries to turn it down to third man, beaten on the outside edge
shot! Leg cutter in the corridor, waits for it, uses his wrists and punches it past point
back of a length in the corridor, punches it in the same direction but third man gets across this time
premeditated charge down the track, makes room and misses his swipe at this full ball that angles across him
slower bounce on middle, gets into the pull early and can only turn it down to fine leg
full outside off, driven to extra cover
good length, wrong'un on middle stump, forward defence
78 kph, tempts him with flight outside off, he steps out and yorks himself. Jams it to cover
full toss on the pads, goes for the sweep, but can't connect. Straight to short fine
full on off stump, steps out and thumps it to the left of long-off

traps him! He's stayed back to this good length ball. Probably thought this one was turning away, but it pitches and spins back in sharply and under his attempted late cut to take middle stump. Should have been forward there
flighted on off stump, wants to power it down to long-off but he's played too early and reaches out. Bat turns in his hand and crawls towards deep square
full and wide outside off, driven to sweeper cover
slower ball, full on off stump, and that's about as perfect as a straight drive gets. But mid-off is straight and cuts it off
low full toss on middle, steps out and carves it nervously to deep cover
full outside off, walks across his stumps and places his drive to the left of deep cover
great yorker. He walks across the stumps and tries to flick this middle-stump yorker, but it's too quick and catches him right in front
good length, angled into the pads, pushed to midwicket
good length on off stump, wrong'un, pushed to short third man off the front foot
flights it nicely on off stump, goes down the track and reaches out to push it to cover
full and flighted outside off, slogged down to long-on
good length on middle stump, steps out and is beaten by flight, catches it on his pads
flighted on middle stump, jumps down the track and hits it on the full to long-on
good length on leg stump, spins down the leg side
wrong'un again, short and wide, tapped comfortably to short third man
122 kph, leg cutter angled in on a good length at off stump, goes forward and opens the face on his defence
good length, angled across him, and he frees his arms and tries to hoick this over long-on and is beaten
short ball at his chest, stands his ground and hooks it to fine leg
back of a length on off stump, goes on the back foot and places it down to third man with an angled bat
full and angled wide again, frees his arms and goes hard at it again. Gets bat this time, but it hits the bottom and goes to mid-off
short and in the corridor, tries to chop it down to third man, beaten
good length on leg stump, goes for a slow sweep, misses and it hits him on the pads
finally middles one. This was floated on a good length at middle stump, he gave him the charge and slapped it over long-on
yorked on the pads, turned away with quick wrists to short fine
shot. Haddin is balanced as he hits this full ball straight over Beer. Nice and relaxed
pushed flat, short and wide, just past the wide marker, and he lets it go
gone! He waits again for this full ball and tries to lift it in a similar manner. But this time, he's messed up the placement and it goes a lot wider - to Quiney at long-off
fired in, good length outside off, it angles in to him and he tries to cut this hard, but gets an outside edge that gets to the boundary quickly

short and wide, frees his arms and goes for the cut, but he's hit this up in the air and straight to backward point. Thirteen more balls and his innings would've been a mirror of KP's earlier today, but his scratchy innings doesn't last that long
back of a length on off stump, defended off his toes to backward point
slower ball, back of a length in the corridor, chops it to backward point
inventive. Angled in at off stump, full length, he steps across, exposes his stumps, gets down and laps it fine. Good connection
back of a length on off stump, pushed towards point
slower ball, good length outside off, and he turns it down to third man
full outside off, steps out, reaches wide as it gets away from him, and slaps it back at the bowler who can't react fast enough and takes it on the shin
short on middle, turns away, but pulled wide of deep midwicket
clean! Flighted outside off, he waits for it nicely and lifts it nicely over long-on
dropped short on middle, goes back and tries to pummel this for six, but gets it high on the bat. Doesn't hit it well enough to find deep midwicket
77 kph, flighted on off stump, waits for it again and slaps it over the bowler
good length on middle, spins in quickly as he backs away and tries to cut it. Cramped, and it goes straight to cover
goes for the yorker, but he puts in a stride and converts it into a full toss on the pads and tickles it fine
good length on off stump, driven to long-off
fired into the pads on a good length, puts a short stride in and pushes with soft hands into the open midwicket region
drifted into the pads again, and he pushes it nicely between deep midwicket and long-on
and again! Good length on middle, goes back and pushes it into that region again. Six runs in three balls, as easy as you get.
flighted on the pads, but this time he drives it firmly to long-on
angled across, full outside off, jammed down to a very fine short third man
low full toss on middle, clears the front leg and hammers it over the bowler
changes it up. Good bouncer, flies past his hook shot
slower bouncer, angles across him from middle stump and he has to pull out of his attempted hook shot
goes for the bouncer again but it's a tad full this time, and sits up nicely outside off for him. He goes back and hooks it over square leg
full and angled wide outside off, just about sneaks past the wide marker
yorker angled across the batsman, wide outside off and he can't get bat to this
typical Botha. Back of a length in the corridor, comes in at him slightly, he jumps, contorts inwards, makes room and chops it down to third man
slower bouncer, follows him down the leg side, he goes for the hook but it's well wide and they sneak through a single as well
full outside off, gets down on one knee and crunches it to the left of deep coverwho fumbles
good length slower ball, down the leg side
short and outside off, jumps up and places this faux upper-cut with the outside edge past the keeper. It's been called a no-ball as well - second bouncer. Free hit.
full on off stump, walks across and gets under it, but can't get the middle as he drives this uppishly past the non-striker
back of a length outside off, mistimed cut to the right of point

oh! Bit of an anti-climax, this. Low full toss on off stump, he punches it back, gets the bottom of the bat and Boland sticks out one hand at this. He gets it, lets it bob up to erase the momentum and takes it - one-handed again - on the second attempt
short and wide, the field is in, and he slashes this uppishly past slip and the Sixers are through to the semi-final, along with the Stars
